text: Artificial intelligence (AI) startup Anthropic has launched its AI assistant Claude in Europe. title: Amazon lower as Web Services boss to leave
text: Amazon.com Inc (NASDAQ:AMZN) fell on Tuesday as news broke its Web Services chief executive, Adam Selipsky, was to step down in June.
